City of Munich – Landeshauptstadt München search close search Enter search term start search Menu close menu navigation language City Hall Events Culture, Leisure Restaurants Shopping Sights Tourism Hotels Business Living Transportation Current language: English Deutsch Français Italiano Русский العربية 中文 Startseite City of Munich Welcome to the City of Munich Areas of Interest Information for Immigrants You want to visit, work, study, settle or seek asylum in Munich? Here's all you need to know. Service for Businesses You're looking to found a start-up oder build a company in Munich? Tools and guidance for entrepreneurs. About the City of Munich All about the capital of Bavaria, its government and its administration: People, projects, facts and figures. European Elections 2024 The European elections will take place on 9 June 2024. Are you a citizen of a European Member State? Have your say on the future of Europe! Cast your vote Top-Articles in English This is a carousel with rotating cards. Use the previous and next buttons to
                    navigate, and Enter to activate cards. Vorheriger Slide Residence Registration When moving to Munich to take up permanent residence, you must register your address within two weeks of your arrival. Europe Direct Munich The Europe Direct Munich provides local residents with a valuable repository of information relating to the EU. Social Work Are you currently in a situation where you need information, counseling or assistance? Receive qualified and confidential counseling free of charge.
